== Update app-install-data ==

The app-install-data package is used by software-center, gnome-app-install, packagekit and adept_installer. It is a collection of desktop files/icons with added meta-information about the packages.

Usually a up-to-date version can be found at:
http://people.canonical.com/~mvo/gnome-app-install/
(updated regularly).

If not, it is generated on a system with a full mirror like this:
<pre>
$ bzr co lp:~mvo/archive-crawler/mvo archive-crawler
$ cd archive-crawler
$ rm -f data/menu-data/*.desktop data/menu-data/icon/* data/desktop.p
$ getMenuData.py --pooldir /src/path/to/pooldir
$ tar czvf menu-data-$(date +%Y%m%d).tar.gz  menu-data menu-data-codecs
</pre>

To update the app-install-data-ubuntu package then run:
<pre>
$ bzr co lp:~ubuntu-core-dev/app-install-data-ubuntu/ubuntu app-install-data-ubuntu
$ cd app-install-data-ubuntu
$ ./update-menu-data.sh /path/to/tarball/with/menu/data
$ utils/diff_helper.py | xargs bzr diff | less
$ bzr commit
$ bzr-build-package -S
dput ...
</pre>
